title: BRIEF-Fura Gems Says Drop-Dead Date For Closing Ruby Assets Agreement Extended
text:
BRIEF-Fura Gems Says Drop-Dead Date For Closing Ruby Assets Agreement Extended

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 27, 2019 18:31)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Fura Gems Says Drop-Dead Date For Closing Ruby Assets Agreement Extended Sept 27 (Reuters) - Fura Gems Inc : * FURA PROVIDES UPDATE ON RUBY TRANSACTION IN MOZAMBIQUE * FURA GEMS INC - EXTENSION OF DROP DEAD DATE FOR CLOSING RUBY ASSETS AGREEMENT * FURA GEMS INC - DROP-DEAD DATE EXTENDED TO OCTOBER 31, 2019

BRIEF-Fura Gems Says Drop-Dead Date For Closing Ruby Assets Agreement Extended
